name: Top - Down Zombies Windows
description:
This Version is For Windows !

You and some of Your Friends Must Survive Against Zombies! 

In each Room, there's 2 Sides, Humans and Zombies, With a lot of Guns that you Can Use, Reach your Objectives to Win the Game!

YOU ARE ALLOWED TO CREATE YOUR OWN ROOMS!

Wanna Create your Own Servers for the Game?
Please Contact us by Email!
